title: Looping Video Portals 1
description: Eight looping videos and three useful BPs to use them.
longDescription:
This pack contains eight videos looping to infinity. Designed to work well with portals, wormholes and other weird transitions these videos are mostly fast paced and have somewhat similar themes among each other. The pack also comes with three unique blueprints being showcased in three example levels, each with their unique standalone systems that let you choose your video files for both in-game and fullscreen purposes. There's also a flash effect between transitions. Two of these BPs teleport the player to a chosen location with a chosen rotation.


Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rFePktJNo5g


★ Eight carefully made fractal video loops.

★ Two resolutions to choose from: 1024x1024 and 2048x2048.

★ Change the colors straight from Material Instances.

★ Change duration of fullscreen portal sequence and the location/rotation of teleporting.

★ Comes with modulated teleportation sounds and an ambience track with industrial humming.

★ Three example maps, each showcasing a slightly different Blueprint. These BPs are:

  • Proximity activated video. E-Key to enter and exit Fullscreen.
  • Proximity activated video. E-Key to enter Fullscreen. Chosen delay to exit Fullscreen.
  • Proximity activated video. Walk even closer the enter Fullscreen. Chosen delay to exit Fullscreen.


★ These Blueprints are standalone and simple: Place the BP on a level - choose the video and possible portal-transition-delay and teleport locations/rotations. That's it!

★ Easy to reverse-engineer. This is a good way to learn how movies work in UnrealEngine, both; in-game and inside widgets.
technicalDetails:
Video Format: MP4

Total Number of Frames: 1000

Number of Looping Videos in 1024² Resolution: 8

Number of Looping Videos in 2048² Resolution: 8

Number of File Media Sources: 8

Number of Media Players: 8

Number of Media Textures: 8

Number of Example Maps: 3

Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of Master Materials: 4

  • M_PortalMASTER
  • M_WidgetPortalMASTER
  • M_IdlePortalMASTER
  • M_WallMASTER

Number of Material Instances: 19

  • MI_Portal (001-008)
  • MI_WidgetPortal (001-008)
  • MI_IdlePortal
  • MI_Wall (01 and 02)

Number of Unique Meshes: 6

Number of Wav-Files: 3

Number of Sound Cues: 4

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Others: Not sure

Network Replicated: No



FAQ:

• Can I use my own videos and just your system?

Yes.


• Can I edit these videos?

Yes. Do whatever with them as long as they are being used inside Unreal Engine. The mp4-files can be found in the Movies-folder of the projects Content-folder.


• I'm a VJ or making a music video. Any chance for (a lot) higher quality versions that allow the use outside UE4-projects? 

Yes! Check https://gumroad.com/kausemus


• I need more help. How can I contact you? underponder@gmail.com
